summary: A quaint player home above Steamscorch Mines Perfect for immersion playthroughs.
descriptionHtml:
Kyne's Rest is a lore friend player home above the Steamscorch Mines in Kynesgrove. And my very first from-scratch mod!

Compatibility:
Compatible with most mods. It conflicts with mods that change the Steamscorch Mine world space such as other homes featured in that spot. It is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67181/?]Kynesgrove[/url] town expansion mod. Which I do recommend with this mod to make the space more full.

Known issues:
[list]
[*]Followers don't want to climb the steps to go into the house. I don't know what to do to fix this. If you have a fix, message me on how to do that.
[*]If you do have Frostfall you can get colder in the house and do not stay warm except by the fire. I also need help on how to fix this.
[*]Day and night doesn't show inside. Still trying to figure that out.
[/list]
author: solangel777
